description:
Successful applicants will be responsible for designing and developing front-end interfaces for MicroSec’s IoT cybersecurity products. Candidates will work closely with the core design team to understand the product capabilities and backend interfaces, as well as the security requirements that must be adhered to. Work will be carried out in an Agile Scrum fashion, with frequent, deliverable increments to the products in collaboration with others. To support full-stack and other engineers in testing, including in the laboratory and field as required.

Candidate will be well versed with UI/UX design as well as its implementation using modern & responsive UIs to manage the security of IoT deployments in the browser and on a variety of devices. Candidate will support the full-stack and other engineers in testing, including in the laboratory and the field as required.

PREREQUISITE

● At least 6 years of production-level experience in modern JavaScript / TypeScript frameworks such as Angular

● Figma or similar interface design tools

● Understanding of HTTPS, CORS and other security-related aspects of frontend web-design

● Experience in working with Docker and Git CI/CD

● Working knowledge of HTML5, CSS and the UI/UX design process

● Working knowledge of Apache/Nginx, RESTful APIs, JSON, OpenAPI/Swagger specifications and Git

● Working knowledge of Sharepoint, mocking and testing frameworks, and dependency injection

● Comfortable in a Linux environment

● Working knowledge of DevOps and how to build a production environment system

OPTIONAL

Languages

● Python

● Go

Markup languages

● Markdown

● Mermaid

Frameworks

● Grafana

Protocols

● TCP/IP stack, TLS

● MQTT or other message brokers

● IoT communication protocols such as BLE, LoRa, ZigBee and others

Skills

● DevSecOps

Take charge and shape Zenyum into one of Asia’s most loved consumer brands working with an ambitious and smart cohort of Smores. As one of our Sales Executives for Singapore, you will be driving your own sales pipeline for Singapore while you elevate the experience of our customers as they embark on their own Zenyum Journey.

Based in our Singapore office, you will be working directly with one of the most talented Heads of Sales, with our top-notch marketing team as part of our amazing team of customer success executive to drive our business and customer experience in the Malaysia market.


Commission and Performance: this position will have a base pay but will be strongly driven by commission on your own performance. This way, we align the success of the company with your amazing performance and a very competitive rewards system.


Help us make Singapore Smile More.


Your responsibilities will be plentiful and fruitful:

  • Sales : from our marketing team you will receive the profiles of customers who have shared their interest to start their Zenyum journey. Your mission will be to guide them through the process with a personalized approach.
  • Customer Experience: as you guide our customers through the process to start their Zenyum journey your mission will be to offer them the most complete information and support that best suits their needs. You are commended to connect empathetically and make their experience truly differential.
  • Operations : You will need to ensure that all key steps in the process to provide a specific and personalized treatment plan are complete at speed. This will mean coordinating with our operations and dental team to ensure the best possible customer experience.
  • Teamwork : You will be asked to work with the rest of the team to identify key challenges in (1) the customer engagement process, (2) operations (3) marketing messaging to customers.
  • Training : as you grow within the organization you will be expected to share your knowledge with the less experienced team members. We progress as a team and you will receive and hopefully will share.

You're a fit for this position, if:

  • You are a full on team player . Here we “row” altogether with one focus and one direction, we never leave anyone behind and that gives us the extra strength to continue growing. As they say “culture eats strategy for breakfast” and we have a team-oriented and customer-centric culture
  • You are driven by results and have a need to get them independent of the circumstances. "No excuses, just new opportunities"
  • You are accustomed to pressure and enjoy the thrill of the ride. If you have successfully navigated the pressure of delivering results constrained by time, if you have overcome challenges to you or your team performance you will fit right in.
  • You are people driven . If your experience and your enjoyment at work are connected to spending time with other people and seeing them grow professionally

We'd love to see you have:

  • At least 3+ years of experience in sales, ideally in a company that offered services.
  • Experience in healthcare and/or beauty will be a very nice plus.
  • University degree or Diploma will be a great addition (but not a specific requirement), especially in fields related to business, communication, hospitality or healthcare.
  • Strong communication, negotiation, and relationship management skill sets, you will be talking to our team and our customers non-stop
  • Language ability in English is needed, Mandrian/Malaysia/ Indonesia/ Tamil are always a plus
  • Have a good understanding of the Singapore, Malaysia and/or Indonesia markets and customers.
  • Positive attitude in fast-paced startup circumstances and a strong team player working with excellent teammates of different nationalities
  • Are curious and creative in testing out new things with a growth hacking mentality

Your benefits and growth upon joining include:

  • Join the diverse team of one of the most ambitious and fastest-growing startups in Southeast Asia, funded by Sequoia Capital
  • Work with professionals not only in the Singapore headquarter but also collaborate with the teams across 9 markets in Asia
  • Fast growth and promotion prospects, in a highly successful and ambitious team
  • Be rewarded with an attractive package (employee benefits and competitive salary and commissions/bonus)

Full time, Singapore

Looking for a heavy-hitter sales individual who has a steady track-record of selling profitable new mid-large accounts (15-20 USD Million) and developing prospects within the APAC region. Works closely with senior regional and national leadership teams and global stakeholders. Involves company resources, as appropriate for the prospect, to be responsive to needs. Leads the teams through the sales process for targeted accounts.

As a Sales Director, Asia Pacific, you will

  • Achieve and exceed defined monthly, quarterly and annual sales targets of profitable new mid-large accounts
  • Develop and execute a sales prospecting plan to target and develop key accounts within Asia Pacific
  • Create value-driven proposals and presentations to maximise win-rate
  • Deliver winning sales presentations that clearly articulate the BCD brand, service and value proposition
  • Works closely with and senior regional and national leadership teams and global stakeholders when appropriate to win customers
  • Effective use of Salesforce to manage sales activity and measure results
  • Deliver regular reports and analysis such as daily call reports, weekly work plans, and monthly and annual territory analysis
  • Monitor competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, products, new products, etc
  • Be a team coach / player- increasing team competencies by mentoring and supporting less experienced team members through the sales process to win targeted accounts

About you

  • Minimum of five (5) years of sales and marketing experience, preferably in the travel, meetings and incentives, or technology industries and in international arena
  • A degree holder
  • Solid track-record of selling profitable new mid-large accounts and developing prospects within the APAC region and in the travel industry
  • Good command of spoken and written English
  • Excellent prospecting, negotiation and presentation skills
  • Confident, proactive and independent

About us
We’re a market leader in travel management: We help people and companies travel smart and achieve more, and our clients include some of the world’s best-known and most innovative business and consumer brands. We operate in more than 100 countries, and the majority of our 10,000+ people work virtually (because a 10-second commute usually makes awesome sense). We’re committed to sustainability and to driving success for our customers, our business and ourselves. Learn more about BCD Travel .

Your life at BCD

Working at BCD means connecting, collaborating and celebrating. You’ll be part of a virtual, dynamic and flexible work environment that fosters a good work-life balance so you can focus on what makes you happy. But don’t just take our word for it! Hear why people join BCD and more about the great perks of Life at BCD .

You’ll be offered

  • Flexible working hours and work-from-home or remote opportunities
  • Opportunities to grow your skillset and career
  • Generous vacation days so you can rest and recharge
  • A compensation package that feels fair to you, including mental, physical, and financial wellbeing tools
  • Travel industry professional perks and discounts
  • An inclusive work environment where diversity is celebrated

Ready to join the journey? Apply now!

We’re dedicated to building a diverse, inclusive and authentic workplace. If you’re excited about a role, but your experience doesn’t align perfectly, we encourage you to apply. You may be just the right candidate for this or other positions.

This position is not open to third-party recruiting agencies.

Who we are?!

I WAS HERE PTE LTD champions the creation of WOWWOWWOW as a concept that brings art creations and art ownerships together to form a new and untapped synergy.

Multi-disciplinary in approach, WOWWOWWOW aspires to make Singapore Art and Design more accessible and to bring art and design into a greater myriad of spaces.

As a producing platform, WOWWOWWOW manages and collaborates with creative talents to create greater exposure for their creative output. At the same time, it creates the platform for greater participation in the arts and designs through emphasis on education, co-creation and active ownership of the art and design making process.

Art | Design | Education | Concept | Branding | Marketing

WOWWOWWOW Team builds off with a flourishing ecosystem of individuals united by a spirit of parallel vision. As an ever-expanding platform, WOWWOWWOW builds upon the foundation of values that initiated this pursuance, excelling from every asset in meaningful collaborations.

Moleskine Singapore

Moleskine brand is synonymous with culture, travel, memory, imagination and personal identity in both the real world and digital world.

It is a brand that encompasses a family of nomadic objects: notebooks, diaries, journals, bags, writing instruments and reading accessories, dedicated to our mobile identity. Moleskine objects are partners for the creative and imaginative professions of our time.

Moleskine, with its Headquarter in Milan, Italy, has offices developed over big cities in the world.

With its fast expansion of APAC businesses, we are now looking for a proactive and high caliber candidate for the position of “Sales Manager - SEA” to join us.

The key responsibility of the SMM is to develop and manage the Retail & Co-Retailing business in Singapore, manage key partner accounts and develop strategic customer business plans that will drive sales growth in SEA. The incumbent will maintain an accurate and healthy sales forecast.

This will be achieved by having a holistic understanding of market trends, a solid relationship with key partner accounts and executing marketing initiatives to optimize sales opportunities.

You will be responsible for:

· Managing the existing network of Wholesale business accounts (Wholesale channels: bookstores, departmental stores, lifestyle, travel retail etc.)

· Developing & expanding our Co-retailing network under the new retail concept & activation

· Developing & managing new Direct Retail network openings & performances

Main tasks

· Define and implement sales strategies to drive sales and achieve business targets

· Maintain control over distribution network to ensure that the brand is well represented and covered through

· Assortment: identify the best performing portfolio, ideal assortment by channel and define the distribution target for key retailers and markets

· Trade tools, POSM for shelf availability and max visibility

· Promotional effectiveness/ROI and dedicated trade plan with promotional matrix (including planning of pop-ups, promoters, events/workshops)

· Oversee and drive all in-store execution in key markets with agencies

· Negotiate commercial terms with Landlords / Retailers / Partners to maximize business & to coordinate the overall development of projects (Store / Counter / POS opening, joint business plan with strategic Retailers etc.) with all internal and external stakeholders

· Assess capability of distributors’ team in key account management, marketing & operations and ensure intervention to strengthen capability for execution

· Identify new market and growth potential

· Conducting regular market visit and sales analytics

· Plan and execute well-defined sales strategies to achieve targets

· Planning forecast order with internal stakeholders

Requirements:

· Minimum 8 years’ experience in distribution & Retail Management of premium lifestyle brands

  • Strong key account management skillset with excellent business acumen & hunger for excellence
  • Self-starter who takes responsibility to deliver business results
  • Exposure to brand & trade marketing would be ideal
  • Previous digital experience with Key Accounts is a plus
  • Possess a positive attitude with strong resilience, commitment, responsibility and working etiquette
  • Good communication skills and strong drive to succeed
  • Must be resourceful, resilience and sales oriented

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $78,000.00 - $90,000.00 per year

Supplemental pay types:

  • 13th month salary
  • Attendance bonus

Experience:

  • Retail management: 8 years (Preferred)

Expected Start Date: 15/03/2023

Hire Digital is looking for an analytical and effective Sales Director- Enterprise Accounts who is adept at driving key account revenue and growing our consultative sales. The Enterprise Sales Director will be responsible for owning the target accounts pipeline and driving our client acquisition programs, analyzing client acquisition metrics, and working with adjacent teams to develop strategies and campaigns to enhance client acquisition.

Responsibilities

  • Find & nurture key sales opportunities: Your number one priority is to ensure our clients see value in their talent engagements. We predominantly work with well-funded companies and enterprises where you will be a trusted advisor and partner helping them think through (and execute) marketing and digital team formation and how best to achieve growth targets. Our clients trust us because of our expertise and willingness to disrupt all elements of the talent and resourcing . You will be seen as a thought partner, tasked with building out best-in-class talent and digital strategies.

  • Manage and oversee a sales team    : this group of individuals is the heart of our business and while you will be tasked with growing the team in the next year, we predominantly want to remain lean. Your role in the team is to ensure all strategy work is exceptional and continues to push the status quo in our industry. As part of this role, you will be tasked with building out and continually improving processes that help us be more effective. You will work to nurture and grow that talent within your department, focusing on improving individual performance and engagement.

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams    : Work alongside our key teams, including Marketing, Talent, and Product, to refine the working process to scale growth.

Requirements

  • Someone with exposure to marketing and digital; your background holds clout, opens doors for you and builds trust with potential clients. You may have been in consultative sales or account management where you were responsible for getting clients in the door and keeping them engaged throughout the customer journey. You use this past knowledge to inspire confidence in our future and current clients.

  • Great at managing a team but want to be doing sales;     it’s likely at this point in your career you’ve managed very large teams. You realize that when a team is huge, almost 100% of your role is focused on people management and you miss hands-on sales. At Hire Digital, we want to create lean teams. This means that you do a great job managing and developing a team, but also appreciate being able to participate in the sales process.

  • Entrepreneurial, a fast-thinker and disruptor;     you’ve spent your career knowing that your work ethic means you outpace your colleagues. You can deliver on work more quickly than most people you know. You value speed and can bring a team along with you to perform at that level. You apply the 80/20 rule and strive for great enough, not perfect.

  • Someone who inspires confidence in clients and is great at building relationships;     you are able to build relationships with clients and other stakeholders very quickly and earn their trust. You understand how to embed yourself in a client’s team and make people feel comfortable even when disrupting the way they currently work.

  • Driven by a continuous desire to learn;     working in a company like ours provides you the opportunity to gain insights into numerous businesses vs. being in-house or at an agency and limited to few products or services. You are someone who thrives in an environment where there is always something new to learn.

Why work with Hire Digital:
We don’t operate in a traditional recruitment or agency model; you will work with a good range of companies, across multiple sectors and markets, and you will have the opportunity to manage a small team of people while continuing to do the work you love, have incredible flexibility in working location and be paid a generous salary + access to a profit sharing plan.

To apply:
We are extremely committed to building a skilled and diverse workforce. We believe in fostering an inclusive workplace where all individuals have an opportunity to succeed. We welcome and encourage applications from everyone.

Job Description

The NUS Public Art Initiative was launched in 2022, arose from the appointment of the NUS Public Art Committee (PAC), from the Office of President, to advice and sustain the NUS public art policy in tandem with campus development. Towards a university public art collection serving NUS mission to educate, inspire and provide enjoyment for the NUS Community, its stakeholders and the public. As a distinct Collection it showcases works of artists affiliated to the NUS, Singapore-based artists, and others whose works and collaborative approaches may contribute to the broader objectives of public art on campus.



Varied Public Art programs are developed providing students a springboard into interdisciplinary research engagement, widening their perspectives, with a critical understanding of their discipline and its wider relevance in a global world.

Duties and Responsibilities

Reporting to the Curator (Public Art), the Executive (Public Art) will provide administrative support on matters relating to the Public Art Committee, its activities, and the management of public art registry.


Public Art Committee Admin and Meetings

  • Provide administrative support to Curator to PAC meetings preparations, minutes taking, and follow up actions;
  • Provide administrative support to Curator to administer proposals related to acquisition or donations of Public Art to NUS, and where relevant, advise Departments/Units on processes, submission requirements and communicate the recommendation of the PAC;

Public Art Registry

  • To provide administrative support to Curator to maintain a registry of artworks in NUS, and liaison with Departments/ Units, on matters concerning documentations, care, and insurance needs of artworks as owners of the artworks; and to respond to inquiries and requests for information regarding public art functions (e.g., collections, exhibitions, appraisals, etc.)
  • To provide administrative support to Curator to coordinate activities related to placement and installation of artworks, including scheduling, procurement and general compliance;

Project Management

  • Provide administrative support to Curator for various projects, including project schedule, procuring vendors, budget, management reports and other related work processes for successful project implementation.

Requirements

  • A graduate degree in contemporary art, art history, visual cultures or related fields
  • Motivated and able to adapt to a fast paced environment
  • Positive team player with experience in collections management and registry and secretariat responsibilities.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills and demonstrate capacity to engage professionally with various stakeholders verbally and in writing.
  • Good project management and organizational skills.
  • Meticulous, resourceful and with a strong sense of initative.

How to Apply

Applicants should apply online via NUS Careers webpage at NUS Careers with the following documentations by 3 April 2023.

  • A cover letter with a brief description of your background and suitability for the position.
  • Curriculum vitae
  • Names and contact details of two referees

We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Covid-19 Message

At NUS, the health and safety of our staff and students are one of our utmost priorities, and COVID-vaccination supports our commitment to ensure the safety of our community and to make NUS as safe and welcoming as possible. Many of our roles require a significant amount of physical interactions with students/staff/public members. Even for job roles that may be performed remotely, there will be instances where on-campus presence is required.

Taking into consideration the health and well-being of our staff and students and to better protect everyone in the campus, applicants are strongly encouraged to have themselves fully COVID-19 vaccinated to secure successful employment with NUS.

ByteDance will be prioritizing applicants who have a current right to work in Singapore, and do not require ByteDance's sponsorship of a visa.


About ByteDance

Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.


Why Join Us

At ByteDance, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for millions of users across all of our products. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at ByteDance.


About the Team

BytePlus is a business unit in ByteDance and provides intelligent services powered by industry-leading technologies. BytePlus helps enterprise customers build what's next for their business. Leveraging Bytedance's cutting-edge technologies, we are devoted to developing innovative products and solutions to shape the future. You can help us to achieve our mission.


Overview

The Creative Designer will work closely with Marketing, Sales, and Product teams to develop materials that articulate our brand and product value. You will be responsible for designing customer-facing materials, mainly videos, not limited to presentations, graphics, and assets for advertising campaigns. The role will include conceptualizing updates to our current materials, focusing on mainly video creations, creating designs for new content, and working to update existing materials from our overseas team.


What you will be doing:

  • Supporting the creation and content of all BytePlus videos and other visual design materials
  • Brainstorming with marketers, copywriters, and brand strategists to bring content plans to life from concept to execution
  • Supporting the sales team by creating appealing videos, animations, and other materials.
  • Partnering and collaborating with overseas teams to repurpose existing assets for team usage
  • Contributing to the development of the initial creative process
  • Stay on top of the latest design and digital trends, and ensure they're reflected in our creative assets


Qualifications


What you should have:

1. Bachelor’s degree in Multimedia Design, Arts, Graphic Design, Communication Design, Visual Communication, or any other related discipline

2. At least 3 years of relevant experience in digital design, and video creation

4. Proficient in multimedia design software such as AE

5. Good communication skills to articulate your concepts in a clear, and concise manner

6. Highly proficient in all aspects of design, with an excellent eye for high-quality artwork

7. Ability to meet deadlines and be well-organized

8. A keen interest in technology, independently staying up to date with the latest developments.


ByteDance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At ByteDance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. About us


Do you have what it takes to be part of the HR team in Titansoft?

As part of the HR team in the Best Tech Company to work for, we do things a bit differently. We're also proud to be holders of HRD Asia's Innovative HR Team award because normalcy is too #mainstream and we are driven to continuously improve everything we do! Something unique about us is that we incorporate Agile into our HR practices, but to be frank, it may not suit everyone. However, if you are passionate to make a difference, are creative, fun and ready to take on challenges head on, then we are looking for people just like you!

(Here's what we mean by fun - our staff dressing up as the God of Prosperity to distribute red packets to our people. Or facilitating a Scrum Team retrospective meeting using Skittles!)

Step into the world of Titansoft and experience HR in a whole new way!


Job Description

What a HR Specialist (L&D Focused) Does in Titansoft

  • Plan, design, and implement talent development programs with in-house subject matter experts and/or external vendors to build a continuous learning culture and contribute to organizational effectiveness and change
  • Source,vet and analyse external learning content and solutions such as trainers, software solutions, and other learning enablers
  • Partner with department heads and conduct training needs analysis to identify skills or knowledge gaps that need to be addressed
  • Manage the training catalogue and calendar management including communication with internal trainers and participants regarding upcoming programs
  • Review L&D processes and policies to ensure that they are business relevant and aligns with L&D trends and practices
  • Manage and facilitate onboarding program for newcomers
  • Coordinate and set up of our new L&D system to support company learning
  • Support the Department Manager on building the overall organisational development
  • This role will also have the opportunity to collaborate and gain exposure in other functions.

Job Requirements

What we are looking for in a HR Specialist (L&D Focused)

Qualifications

Minimum Degree in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, Commerce, Social Science (Psychology) with preferably 3 years of working experience.

To be successful in this role...

You will be required to communicate well with internal and external parties. Strong written skills will be advantageous. Being meticulous and analytical will help you to discover new insights to solve problems. At times, things may get hectic, adrenaline will kick in and you will need to be able to adapt quickly. Our "weapon of choice"? Microsoft Office Applications! (As such, proficiency is a must)

Qualities

Proficient in Chinese language is preferred, in order to work well with our mandarin-speaking stakeholders overseas for company-wide projects

Don't be afraid to challenge the status quo. Be passionate about continuous learning (As this is one of our core values, if you don't enjoy continuously improving yourself, you might find it stressful in our environment). Not forgetting that being open to ideas/feedback and being adaptive would help you to fit into our culture a lot easier.

If you are able to facilitate discussions with other teams, that would be splendid!

What every Titaner enjoys (psst. we didn't get that Best Tech Company to Work for Award in 2017 for nothing!)

  • 18 days of rest and relaxation for each year (P.S. It gets even better over the years!)
  • Competitive salaries and bonuses bench-marked against big players in the industry (Yeap, those companies!)
  • Flexible working hours (Sleep in a little longer after fixing that pesky bug from last night)
  • Comprehensive insurance coverage Very well-stocked pantry (We've never heard of the term 'Hunger Games', nope)
  • Communities of Practice and Workshops catered for your growth and learning
  • Substantial subsidies and programs to keep that creative flow while having fun (Health promotion program, annual overseas company outing, an annual dinner that nobody will ever forget, etc.)
  • Hardcore work and hardcore fun!

JET.AVE is a local marketing agency started by Jet and Ave in 2016 to help brands connect with their consumers. We believe communication is a two-way street, a conversation. Brands should either start or join a conversation instead of having a monologue (cues hard-selling) and risk appearing unapproachable. Our mission is to provide clients direction to navigate around that. And that is also why JET.AVE’s logo and website look is street-themed – we’re not an automotive company!

We are big enough to dare, but small enough to care. How we operate or manage clients have never been determined by the “industry norm”. We set out to be change-makers, operating in ways that we believe in and continuously refine them to serve our people and clients better. The agency personalises strategies for every client and consistently delivers highly original creatives.

Company Description


POWERING CRYPTO WITH DATA
CoinMarketCap is the world’s most trusted and accurate source of data for cryptocurrencies. Used by millions of individuals, organizations, and exchanges, CoinMarketCap brings the most up-to-date market capitalizations, pricing, and cryptocurrency information to our users.

Pulling data from multiple exchanges and combining our robust research allows us to provide the most realistic representation of each cryptocurrency. As we grow, we will continue to provide access to our data wherever, whenever, and however is most helpful to our users.

CREATING AN OPEN WORLD
Our mission is to be the world’s authority on cryptocurrency data. We believe in an open and decentralized world, where we play a pivotal role in powering decisions and insights to drive greater understanding and adoption of cryptocurrencies. We want to achieve this mission with people who truly believe in the value and potential of empowering individuals.

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

At Paradigm, we are changing the future of finance! By joining us at this early stage, you’ll be building cutting-edge, distributed financial service infrastructure that will reshape financial services across CeFi and DeFi markets.

About Paradigm

  • Paradigm is a zero-fee, institutional liquidity network for derivatives traders across CeFi and DeFi.
  • We provide unified access to multi-asset, multi-protocol liquidity on demand without compromising on execution preferences, costs, and immediacy.
  • We’ve built the largest network of institutional counterparties in crypto, with over 1000 institutional clients trading over $10 B per month.
  • We are a diverse, global team led by our organizational principles and united by our mission to bring on-demand liquidity for traders, anytime and anywhere, without compromises. We also strive to ship faster than anyone else in the industry!
  • We are backed by the best traders and investors in the space, including Jump Capital, Genesis Trading, Dragonfly Capital, QCP Capital, Optiver US, IMC, GSR Markets, Akuna Capital, Fidelity Digital Assets CMT Digital, Goldentree Asset Management, Amber Group, OK Group, Bybit Fintech, and CoinShares.

The role
We’re looking for a seasoned SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test) to take overall ownership of our automation codebase. This will start as a technical leadership role but has the opportunity to turn into a people management role over time. Strong technical and communication skills are a requirement, as is an ability to act autonomously.
Responsibilities
  • Overall ownership of our scalable test automation framework and test scripts to ensure repeatability, coverage, reliability and catching regressions.
  • Ensure high quality software is delivered in each weekly or bi-weekly release
  • Creating test plans for new features and improving existing test plans including identifying areas for automation
  • Research and resolve any broken automation scripts that fail during execution
  • Create and maintain documentation for automation procedures for existing and future team members

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree (B.S.) in Computer Science; or 5+ years of related experience
  • 6+ years of developing and maintaining frontend regression frameworks, preferably in Python
  • Solid knowledge of QA methodologies, test planning, system dependencies, and product integration phases
  • Solid knowledge of Selenium, Appium or Katalon Studio
  • Experience with git, Javascript, REST and Websocket APIs

This is a flexible hybrid position at our headquarters office. We are able to provide financial and logistical support for work Visa procurement and relocation, if applicable.


Our Benefits and Perks

  • Flexible work environment

  • Full benefits (benefits vary by country)

    • Health Flexible Savings Account (FSA)
    • Long Term Disability and Life Insurance
    • Retirement savings (i.e. Traditional and Roth 401(k))
    • Paid Parental Leave
  • Generous technology and learning allowances
    • $5000 first-year budget to spend on your computer, peripherals, office essentials...whatever makes you most efficient and comfortable. You'll receive a $2000 refresh each anniversary.
    • $1000 budget to spend on learning and development materials, courses or conferences.


Paradigm US is an equal opportunity employer.

Brand Manager
Travel Retail APAC, Singapore

Coty is one of the world’s largest beauty companies with an iconic portfolio of brands across fragrance, color cosmetics, skincare, and body care. COTY is the global leader in fragrance and number three in color cosmetics. COTY’s products are sold in over 150 countries around the world. COTY and its brands are committed to a range of social causes as well as seek to minimize its impact on the environment. For additional information about Coty Inc., please visit www.coty.com .

ROLE AND DEPARTMENT
We’re looking for a Brand Manager to join the Travel Retail Asia Pacific team, to be based in Singapore. This role will be responsible not only for the commercial success of brands’ under their care, but also the acceleration of Coty’s ambitions within skincare and fragrance space, through impactful marketing strategy and impeccable execution. As the Marketing Support Function in the team, you will work closely with TR WW and Global Marketing teams to grow brand equity and visibility. Together with cross functional teams (such as merchandising, digital, education and demand planning), you will be responsible for marketing operational planning to support commercial team to drive sales and market share objectives.

THE ROLE

In this role you will be responsible for:
Brand & Trade Marketing Develop short to long-term brand and launch plans in conjunction with Sales, Digital & IM team to support sales growth and market share for the portfolio of brands. Adapting the global brand strategies to provide guidelines for the yearly trade plans to ensure efficiency of the marketing strategies and to better target key consumers in the region. Suggest Travel Retail Exclusive offerings and promotions tailored to the region ensuring the needs of the business are catered for. Plan and execute animations and podiums in conjunction with Sales and Visual Merchandising to drive visibility and ensuring maximum consumer engagements and sales conversion. Define GWP strategy and ensuring brands have the right GWP assortment/mix to be competitive, design and develop non-product GWP as necessary, ensure brand guidelines and image is respected. Define right pricing strategy for new innovations, partnering with Pricing team to ensure global benchmarks are respected and in line with TR regulations. Proactively track competitors’ animation and promotion best practices to strengthen brand plans. Partner with digital team to drive maximum synergy across different digital consumer touch points to drive ecomm growth. Partner IM team to develop cohesive social media strategy to build brand desirability, and support launches and brand development. Track and improve marketing ROI for key launches and initiatives

Demand Planning & Forecasting Partner with demand planning to deliver forecast accuracy by lines to ensure right inventory level for target achievement. Estimate forecast potential for new marketing initiatives (including TREX) by reviewing internal and external benchmarks, and work with key stakeholders to realise commercial ambitions; rephase forecasts as required and track performance of innovations and key franchises/categories. Carry out yearly portfolio SKU rationalisation and make plans as required for discontinuations and E&O reduction Utilise existing tools for business analysis for sell-in and sell-out data performance.

Reporting & Others Monthly and Quarterly reporting per brand on brand & launch performances and provide actionable conclusions. Also manage adhoc reporting requests as required. Provide valuable insights to TRWW and Global Marketing teams on required support tools, product development opportunities and brand and competitor performance using them to enhance brand performance and results Support and preparation for retailer’s presentation meetings

WHAT YOU’LL BRING
We’d love to see candidates who have: 5-7 years of holistic brand management experience in Luxury Beauty, particularly in Skincare and Fragrance. Experience in the Travel Retail industry will be an advantage. Excellent time management skills and the ability to prioritize effectively and work under pressure. Possess strong business acumen with good analytical and problem-solving skills. Team player with strong collaborative skills; having the ability to develop effective working relationships both internally & externally and excel in a multi-cultural environment. Proactive, agile and resilient character. Results oriented with proven track record. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Mandarin (able to liaise with Mandarin speaking colleagues or associates). Multi-brand management experience is preferred High proficiency in Excel and Powerpoint

WHAT WE OFFER
This is a unique role with a genuine opportunity to make an impact. You’ll get to work in a diverse environment with a team who are passionate about the work they do and know how to have some fun along the way.

WorldQuant develops and deploys systematic financial strategies across a broad range of asset classes and global markets. We seek to produce high-quality predictive signals (alphas) through our proprietary research platform to employ financial strategies focused on exploiting market inefficiencies. Our teams work collaboratively to drive the production of alphas and financial strategies – the foundation of a balanced, global investment platform.
Technologists at WorldQuant research, design, code, test and deploy projects while working collaboratively with researchers and portfolio managers. Our environment is relaxed yet intellectually driven. Our teams are lean and agile, which means rapid prototyping of products with immediate user feedback. We seek people who think in code, aspire to tackle undiscovered computer science challenges and are motivated by being around like-minded people. In fact, of the 600 employees globally, approximately 500 of them code every day.
WorldQuant’s success is built on a culture that pairs academic sensibility with accountability for results. Employees are encouraged to think openly about problems, balancing intellectualism and practicality. Excellent ideas come from anyone, anywhere. Employees are encouraged to challenge conventional thinking and possess an attitude of continuous improvement. That’s a key ingredient in remaining a leader in any industry.
Our goal is to hire the best and the brightest. We value intellectual horsepower first and foremost, and people who demonstrate an outstanding talent. There is no roadmap to future success, so we need people who can help us build it. Our collective intelligence will drive us there.
The Role: As a Core C++ Developer, you will:
  • Design and implement various components in low latency trading system, including but not limited to feed handlers, order management system, and the exchange simulator
  • Understand and participate in the development of the trading infrastructure; design and prototype the latency tracking system
  • Assist in the implementation and testing of new quantitative models and strategies; refactor and improve the implementation for lower latency on critical path
  • Collaborate with technology teams on the production of the trading system; develop tools and scripts to monitor the health of the processes
What You’ll Bring:
  • Computer science or engineering background

The multi-brand cluster Store Design & Visual Merchandising Director role is a key partner to the Brand General Managers for all in store executions of displays. The Director role here is to adapt & drive the brand equity in the region, She/He is to establish the work demands, drive the discussion to requests & needs. And will own all stakeholder reviews for all SD & VM scopes. She/He has the priority to deliver on closing all Brand needs in the workflow & team management. This role will require participation with TR retailers and corporate initiatives on occasion.

The SDVM Director will lead a multi-branded design function reporting of Visual Merchandisers and Store Designers at various levels. It will require the individual to be exemplary in people management of diverse styles & performance. She/He must have a strong leadership approach & driving design skill sets as a core. A working knowledge of partnering with a NY TR brand GM & APAC Brand GM requires this role to be working in different time zones – US/UK & APAC.

She/He will partner to deliver Global Brand / APAC Strategy & Corporate initiatives in category or brand distortion. She/He will need to ensure on closing of VM execution details across sites including permanent, temporary and event sites, and managing the cost & budget within. She/He is to lead projects and align with key stakeholders in APAC as well as global, to meet the deliverables whilst meeting the results. On occasion, the incumbent will review, establish, recommend, and support the re-negotiating of retailer requirements to these sites will be required.

Additional corporate activity in omni-channel development in VM enhancements of digital is required, technology in the VM design is a significant part of the innovation of retail work, to be seamlessly & ergonomically included within future sites. This includes executing existing strategies in centralised screen executions.

The rollout of branded/multi-branded store design is an integral part of the role. The store renewals & the new sites vary based on the Airport or Downtown retailers demands. The unique demands of these sites vary across the local variances of shopper consumer insights.

The adaptation of the visual language of each brand/each site will need to be considered. The use of lightboxes vs LED screens that sufficiently balances the whole store effect is critical & requires a precise visual balance of these site by site. And to ensure that each launch is maximized in every site.

The rollouts of visual merchandising is traditionally focused on a by element rollout & execution, such as a bar or a makeup unit. However, in this role, the primary goal is to ensure the synergies of the eventing designs, the VM props, the by shelf display & the new store rollouts are brought together in synergy.

The responsibility includes design & execution management within budget, in close collaboration with Project Management & brand Marketing team. She/He is to ensure the team. works thru the budget required and review for every execution.

This role will report directly to the SDVM Regional Director.

This role is based in Singapore & is located within the APAC Travel Retail division.



Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree / Master’s degree in industrial design, Visual Communication, or Interior Design/Architecture.
  • With min experience of 15 years in Branded/Interior/Retail Architecture environments in beauty/fashion & brands.
  • A strong understanding in the shopper journey in retail industry and experiences in Cosmetics/Fragrances retail design, preferably have experiences in all categories including skincare, make-up, and fragrances.
  • Experience working in regional/global organisations is a must, ability to communicate & multi-task with different departments to execute the completion of projects.
  • A highly integrated individual with strong passion to deliver design accuracy, to lead sustainability and to train/educate teams to close design development and execute the completion of projects.
  • A strong ability to communicate design development efficiently and effectively, with teams and partners including retailers and stakeholders in both verbal and written forms is essential.
  • A strong ability and experience managing cost and budget, and an ability to communicate cost with teams and partners including shop fitters and global partners is critical for this role.
  • Highly proficient in Computer skills, AutoCad, Vectorworks is essential, and Cinema 4D, Adobe Suite of softwares would be additional.
  • Extensive network & knowledge of shopfitters, retailers & procurement processes will be highly advantageous to the success of this role.
  • Regional travel required at approximately 30~40%.

S&P Global Market Intelligence

The Role: Sales Specialist, Markit Digital

The Team:
The Markit Digital team designs, develops, and hosts data rich, full featured, and high traffic web and mobile applications for financial institutions, brokerages, and media clients from all over the world. Our core focus is aggregating and delivering financial data and tools within our clients’ digital platforms. Markit Digital, an S&P Global Market Intelligence company, is hiring a sales specialist to drive our outbound sales efforts in Asia. You will have the opportunity to work in a professional environment with high profile companies in the finance industry. We are a small, tight-knit, high-energy group responsible for acquisition of new business and accounts, existing client support, and strategic opportunity development. We work closely in teams to promote an inclusive environment with tons of idea sharing.

The Impact:
As a member of our Sales & Business Development team, you will play a critical role in expanding and retaining our existing client base. You will work cross-functionally with your agile feature team counterparts to understand current status of initiatives, as well as your peers in technology, finance and sales to create and execute account growth and retention strategies. You will also be tasked with prospecting a defined set of retail brokerage and asset management customers in order to build pipeline and close new sales opportunities.

What’s in it for you:
In this role, you will thrive in a team environment, demonstrate self-motivation and understanding of the financial services industry and the vendor/client relationship. You will have a direct ability to drive revenue and should be able to assess an account’s growth potential as well as spot buying signals.

Responsibilities:
Drive all aspects of sales including lead generation, relationship building, pipeline management, proposal development, high level solutions design, and pricing
Frequently meets with clients in-person and via presentations, matching Markit Digital solutions to current and future strategic customer challenges
Ensure that accurate forecasting, pipeline management and other sales process / infrastructures are established
Works on issues of diverse scope where analysis requires evaluation of a variety of factors including a strong understanding of client need
Relationship development and cultivation with key customers and prospects
Assist in the management of the entire sales lifecycle of a deal including liaising with senior sales people and client support to provide ongoing support and training to existing clients
Assist in customer retention, ensuring customer satisfaction leading up to contract renewals
Prepare commercial proposals and contracts
Negotiate scope, commercial and legal terms in contracts with support
Maintain account and contract overviews

What We’re Looking For:
Expertise in analyzing clients’ needs and requirements, preferably having consultative sales experience
Excellent oral and written communication skills; experience presenting to senior stakeholders preferable
Familiarity with contract and invoicing processes, from the client perspective
Consultative, problem-solving approach to sales/business development, relationships, and solutioning
Bachelor’s degree and at least seven to ten years equivalent experience, preferably within FinTech, web technology, market data or analytics
Client-facing experience in an account management, project management or sales role preferred
Experience building relationships with C-level executives
Expertise in Salesforce and Microsoft Office Suite; familiarity with Adobe InDesign is a plus
Strong time management, organizational and decision-making skills

S&P Global Grade ( relevant for internal applicants only ): 13

The Location: Sydney or Singapore

S&P Global delivers essential intelligence that powers decision making. We provide the world’s leading organizations with the right data, connected technologies and expertise they need to move ahead. As part of our team, you’ll help solve complex challenges that equip businesses, governments and individuals with the knowledge to adapt to a changing economic landscape.

S&P Global Market Intelligence partners with customers to broaden their perspective and operate with confidence by bringing them leading data sources and technologies that embed insight in their daily work.

About Us

LiquidX Studio is a gaming development studio with the goal to produce an open-world AAA game called Pixelmon.

We are based in Singapore and Malaysia with many of our team collaborating remotely from countries like New Zealand, Spain, Indonesia, and Brazil. With large backing from our recently raised funding round, we aim to create an entirely unique experience with immersive gameplay and extensive lore that will wow all gamers.


The Challenge

LiquidX is in search of an experienced and enthusiastic Character Artist to join our team and create outstanding 3D characters for our upcoming game. The ideal candidate should possess expertise in 3D modelling, texturing, lighting and animation programs, as well as knowledge of game engine optimization techniques.

You should be able to create realistic textures, materials and lighting effects, and meet deadlines and work within budget limitations. You will be collaborating with other team members in order to ensure character designs meet technical requirements and incorporate feedback from game designers and producers.


What You Can Expect To Work On

  • Develop 3D characters using 3D modelling, texturing and animation programs
  • Provide proxy models for early game integration
  • Collaborate with other members of the team to ensure character designs meet technical requirements, and ensuring that characters are optimised for game engines
  • Understand asset limitations, project milestones, and risk, while meeting deadlines, and working within the budget limitations
  • Produce models according to the Art director's visio
  • Create high quality, detailed character models and assets
  • Create efficient and rig friendly, low polygon models for game integration
  • Unwrap low polygon models and create high quality color maps
  • Guarantee the quality and delivery on time of 3D modelling and mapping as regards the characters and actors needed for producing the game



Requirements

What You Need to Succeed

  • Experience: 4 years of Character Art experience in the gaming industry
  • Game art asset pipeline management experience : Strong knowledge in hi-poly, & low poly modelling and digital sculpting techniques, paired with a strong knowledge of topology for animation
  • Technical Skills : Familiar with 3ds Max/Maya, Substance Painter, Substance Designer, Zbrush, Photoshop, Blender
  • Discipline Proficiency : Human Anatomy, Creature Anatomy, Hard Surface Modeling, Cloth Sculpting or Simulation, Hand-painted Textures
  • Unreal Engine : Knowledge of game engine with asset integration, and optimization techniques
  • Problem-Solving: Analytical mind, Attention to detail and problem-solving aptitude
  • Independent : Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
  • Passionate about games : You love playing games, and enjoy watching them come to life.


Benefits and Why You’ll Love Working With Us

  • We Listen. Your voice, ideas, and suggestions matters to us, as we continuously evolving
  • Our People. You’ll be working with a diverse, multicultural, international, talented, fun, supportive, and innovative people and team. We are people you can be proud to work with
  • On The Edge of Innovation. Working on the latest technological, social and financial trends that is web3 and blockchain
  • Flat Organisation. our team is a community, we work together as a team from all levels in true decentralised spirit

About ByteDance

Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.


Why Join Us

At ByteDance, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for millions of users across all of our products. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at ByteDance.


About the Team

BytePlus is a business unit in ByteDance and provides intelligent services powered by industry-leading technologies. BytePlus helps enterprise customers build what's next for their business. Leveraging Bytedance's cutting-edge technologies, we are devoted to developing innovative products and solutions to shape the future. You can help us to achieve our mission.


Overview

The Creative Designer will work closely with Marketing, Sales, and Product teams to develop materials that articulate our brand and product value. You will be responsible for designing customer-facing materials, mainly videos, not limited to presentations, graphics, and assets for advertising campaigns. The role will include conceptualizing updates to our current materials, focusing on mainly video creations, creating designs for new content, and working to update existing materials from our overseas team.


What you will be doing:

  • Supporting the creation and content of all BytePlus videos and other visual design materials
  • Brainstorming with marketers, copywriters, and brand strategists to bring content plans to life from concept to execution
  • Supporting the sales team by creating appealing videos, animations, and other materials.
  • Partnering and collaborating with overseas teams to repurpose existing assets for team usage
  • Contributing to the development of the initial creative process
  • Stay on top of the latest design and digital trends, and ensure they're reflected in our creative assets


Qualifications

1. Bachelor’s degree in Multimedia Design, Arts, Graphic Design, Communication Design, Visual Communication, or any other related discipline

5. Good communication skills to articulate your concepts in a clear, and concise manner

6. Highly proficient in all aspects of design, with an excellent eye for high-quality artwork

7. Ability to meet deadlines and be well-organized

8. A keen interest in technology, independently staying up to date with the latest developments.


ByteDance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At ByteDance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. Our mission is to move more with less. The world is changing, people want shorter and cheaper journeys and their goods to be delivered faster. Gone are the days when manual planning suffices. SWAT is building the technology to allow fleet operators and logistic companies to compete in this new world.


The patented algorithm we developed solves an academic problem (researched since the 1980s) called the “pickup and delivery with time windows” – in layman terms: "how do you move the most number of objects (people or parcels), using the least number of vehicles, in the shortest time or distance possible". SWAT is the market share leader in pooling optimization technology in South East Asia and operates in countries like Singapore, Japan, The Philippines and Thailand. We are tackling some of the most challenging transport/logistics problems in the world’s most congested cities. Many large corporations from different industries such as shipping, logistics, airline, pharmaceutical, utilities, banking, property development and public transport use our technology to improve employee commute convenience and happiness and save costs. It’s also greener, more sustainable. Our customers are governments, public transport operators or large companies with challenging employee commute needs.


Come join our AI SaaS high growth tech startup if you also have the ambition to make a big impact in making the world move more sustainably. There is so much more we want to do and it will be a great place for you to learn and grow with the company.

brings a fresh and customer-centric perspective to the legal solutions world.
KorumLegal provides flexible on-demand People solutions, legal process and operations consulting and
Managed Legal Services incorporating smart LegalTech and delivers greater flexibility, innovation, and
value to customers. In doing so, we are reshaping legal solutions together for a better tomorrow.


About the role
We’re looking for a Head of Sales & Business Development with the ambition to help us continue our
revenue growth and brand building in SEA. This is a unique role where you will be responsible for growing
both the customer and the consultant base, focusing on how to match customer demand with the
appropriate consultant in order to accelerate revenue growth. You will be an experienced sales and/or
business development professional with a legal background who understands and is excited by our
business mission and who demonstrates energy and passion for driving our business forward and
contributing towards meeting our ambitious growth plans.
You are an individual that can bring together technology, expert practitioners and specialists, you can
design and cross-sell connected products to customers. Your role will be to manage a number of targets
to drive opportunities, relationships and revenue across our organization.


Key responsibilities
Sales
  • Proactively introduce new customer opportunities and identify consultant talent.
  • Collaborate with Marketing and Customer Solutions Teams, to identify qualified leads and convert
into successful sales to exceed revenue targets.
  • Focus on sales lead generation, customer meetings and referrals to build a healthy sales pipeline of
new customers.
  • Engage with customers and consultants to develop long term mutually beneficial relationships.
  • Help drive growth to position us as the market leader in SEA and contribute towards and execute on
strategic sales growth plans.


Business Development
  • Seek out innovative ways to communicate our value proposition to customers and consultants.
  • Build our profile in the market, proactively identify the range of opportunities and create compelling
sales strategies to win and expand business.
  • Offer input to product and service development through understanding customer needs.
  • Provide thought-leadership content and input into profile-raising activities.
  • Spot partnership opportunities as this segment of the legal industry continues to evolve.
  • Contribute to strategic planning for expansion into other SEA markets beyond Singapore.
  • Ensure that best practice is shared and customer and regional intelligence is communicated.
  • Understand the wider offerings of KorumLegal and gain a good understanding of broader sector /
client trends, issues, needs, and potential applicability.

Key performance indicators
  • Sales revenue (new and existing customers).
  • Generation of new sales leads.
  • Onboarding Consultants and securing roles for them
  • Conversion of prospects, by proactively moving leads through the sales pipeline.
  • Strengthen the ‘KorumLegal’ brand in SEA, both amongst consultants and customers.


Key requirements
  • A demonstrated ability to impact revenue growth and achieve sales targets.
  • You are a strong negotiator, influencer and team player, used to managing multiple stakeholders in
demanding time-critical situations.
  • Sector experience and an existing network in Legal/Professional Services industries is advantageous
  • Good understanding of the ALSP and NewLaw value proposition of innovative legal solutions and its
positioning and potential within the wider industry.
  • Comfortable navigating sales conversations with senior executives, legal and non-legal.
  • Ability to see the strategic big picture but willing to roll up their sleeves with a can-do attitude.
  • Motivated self-starter, able to work and thrive in a scale-up environment.
  • An analytical mind and a data driven approach to sales strategies
  • Exemplary verbal and written English are a must. Knowledge of Mandarin or another Asian language
will be advantageous but not necessary.
  • A hunter, who understands the importance of working with a team

• Responsible for prospecting new business acquisition through cold calling.
  • Address the customer’s queries related to both sea and airfreight shipments.
  • Identify business opportunities during the tele-qualification process and follow-up to close the business.

Requirements:

  • Diploma and above
  • At least 2 years of sales/cold calling experience in Logistics industry.
  • Good knowledge in both sea and airfreight shipments.

Title: Manager, AP Human Resources Business Partner (Talent Acquisition focus)

What impact will you make?
Deloitte Asia Pacific (AP) brings together our geographies in Australia, China, Japan, Korea, New Zealand, Southeast Asia and Taiwan with up to 4,000 partners and 60,000 professionals. The formation of the Deloitte Asia Pacific Member Firm enhances our ability to provide a more seamless client experience across geographical boundaries, while at the same time offering you unique and unrivalled career experiences and opportunities.

We have an exciting opportunity for an ambitious and experienced Human Resources talent to join our Deloitte Asia Pacific Talent team. The successful candidate will partner with AP HR and other functions’ stakeholders to execute on various HR projects that align with the overall people strategy. This role works directly with the AP Talent Acquisition Leader and AP HR Senior Manager.

This position offers a promising professional development opportunities and exposure in working in multiple countries across the Asia Pacific region. If you are an experienced Talent Acquisition professional and would like to grow your HR skillset in other areas within the HR spectrum, this is the role for you.

Responsibilities


Talent Acquisition Projects (50%)
  • Work as a Talent Acquisition (TA) project lead and drive various regional recruiting strategies and projects like activation of Center of Excellence and Community of Practice.
  • Track project timelines and develop dashboards & metrics.
  • Monitor market trends to develop proposals and create proposals for investments in people, processes, and technologies for the TA organization.
  • Conduct time-to-time analytical assessments of existing practices and processes; design programs, initiatives, and proposals to implement best practices that help transform TA practices.
  • Design and develop proposals and presentations for the regional business and talent leadership.
  • Work seamlessly with other enabling groups, such as brand, communications, risk, general counsel, and information technology.

Human Resources Business Partner roles (50%)
  • Operational leader for AP regional recruitment including recruitment posting, candidate sourcing & screening, interview arrangement, employment offer negotiation and onboarding.
  • Participate in HR projects and initiatives including, but not limited, to supporting regional performance management of AP employees in 8 geographies, AP integration and harmonization projects, talent retention and competitiveness analysis studies, etc.
  • Collaborate with HR business partners across the region and business units to ensure consistency of processes and sharing of best practices. Provide recommendations and bring in new ideas to improve AP talent processes where applicable.
  • Partner with HR Senior Manager to act as HR Business Partner to the AP Business Unit leaders to provide HR insights and advice on people related matters and initiatives.
  • Collaborate with AP talent data analytics team to ensure data consistency and data is best utilized to achieve possible synergy effect for TA related analysis and dashboards.
Your role as a leader

At Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We expect our people to embrace and live our purpose and shared values, challenging themselves everyday to identify issues that are most important to our clients, our people and the communities, and to make an impact that matters. In addition to living our purpose, Senior Managers across our Firm are expected to:

  • Establish a strong leadership brand by inspiring others through passion, integrity, and appreciation.
  • Create opportunities to drive impact by leveraging each person’s strengths to build high performing teams.
  • Apply deep knowledge of trends and activity to drive continuous improvement.
  • Build lasting relationships across a diverse network.
  • Translate and communicate broader strategy into a convincing team vision and goals, in order to align the team and sets priorities to achieve objectives.
  • Actively contribute to building the talent pipeline by championing a talent experience that attracts, develops and retains top talent and high performing teams.
  • Manage diverse teams within a highly inclusive team culture where team members feels supported, respected and engaged.

Requirements:
  • Minimum Bachelor's degree in HR management or related business disciplines
  • Minimum 6-8 years of relevant experience in Talent Acquisition, and other HR generalist roles in MNCs (Professional Services or Legal firm would be ideal)
  • Experienced in working in a fast paced, highly matrixed and multi-national environment is a real advantage
  • Ability to independently work with multiple stakeholders at various levels across AP region and with a strong collaborative and can-do mindset
  • Strong project management, analytical, and communication skills
  • Advanced to Mastery level knowledge of Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint, and other analytical tools will be advantageous
  • Research-oriented mindset

With annual sales exceeding 9 figures, our direct-to-consumer eCommerce brand is scaling fast, quietly becoming a dominant player in our industry the last few years. This has brought recognition by The Financial Times ranking us 12th among Asia Pacific’s High-Growth Companies in 2023. Within Singapore, The Straits Times and Statista ranked us 4th among the fastest-growing companies.

One pillar of our early growth has been the “Tech Stack” we have built, maintained, and grown for our business. The software we leverage, the platforms we integrate, and the solutions we iterate as part of our infrastructure. This backbone supports up to 8000 orders a day from across the world.

As we continue towards our vision of building a billion-dollar portfolio of brands and products, our ability to build on these foundations and behaviours will be crucial. By now we understand that eCommerce is software and platforms too.

The Role
We are looking for an eCommerce Web Developer who has strong skills in technology, problem-solving, and multi-tasking. The ideal candidate will be passionate about maintaining high uptimes and maximising operational efficiency.

You will play a critical role in how our tech stack operates as well as build new solutions that drive a 9-figure business to its next stages.

Applicants for this role must understand:

  • Our team is lean, yet growing quickly. The faster we grow, the more challenging your role becomes.
  • As eCommerce operates 24/7, you must have a strong sense of ownership over your responsibilities regardless of official hours. Maintaining as close to 100% ecommerce uptime is a goal.
  • You must be quick to adapt as you will be joining us in the midst of scaling. The pace will be fast.

Responsibilities
As a Web Developer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining software solutions for our infrastructure. You will work closely with stakeholders and vendors to understand our business requirements and use technical expertise to solve problems.


Our Tech/Software infrastructure includes these platforms and applications:

  • Shopify
  • Shopify theme files and liquids
  • Carthook
  • Braintree, PayPal, Stripe
  • VWO
  • Klaviyo
  • Loop
  • Wonderment
  • Google Analytics, Hyros, lifetimely tracking platforms
  • Zendesk
  • Lastpass
  • NoFraud
  • Amazon
  • ...And many others


Specific activities that you will be doing on the platforms above:

  • Set up web pages, funnels, automation, scripts, and other required features.
  • Plan, implement and integrate software solutions across the tech stack to enhance team and business capabilities.
  • Customise user interfaces and functions to optimise customer experience.
  • Troubleshoot and maintain systems to ensure optimal performance and availability.
  • Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders on projects, change requests, technical issues, and escalations.
  • Conduct regular assessments of platform uptime, performance, and security. Not limited to uptime/functionality checks, evaluating Javascript errors, and page loading speeds
  • Stress testing systems to identify and address loopholes and issues.
  • Document technical operations processes.
  • Staying up-to-date with the latest changes to implement new features and functionalities.
  • Other ad-hoc technical and IT-related tasks.


About Our Company
Maneuver builds, operates and scales hyper-growth health and wellness e-commerce brands. Our goal is to elevate quality of life with functional supplements. In just 4 years, we started and grew our health and wellness brand from zero to $100M+ in annual revenue, serving more than 1 million customers worldwide and counting. We aim to be a dominant force and make a dent in this industry in the coming years by disrupting the traditional ways health and wellness brands are built.

The Applications Development Technology Lead Analyst is a senior level position responsible for establishing and implementing new or revised application systems and programs in coordination with the Technology team. The overall objective of this role is to lead applications systems analysis and programming activities.

Function Overview:

Citi's Treasury and Trade Solutions group is built on the power of our network. Citi Treasury and Trade Solutions (TTS), provides integrated cash management and trade finance services to multinational corporations, financial institutions and public sector organizations across the globe. With a full range of digital and mobile enabled platforms, tools and analytics, TTS continues to lead the way in delivering innovative and tailored solutions to its clients. TTS offers the industry's most comprehensive suite of treasury and trade solutions including cash management, payments, receivables, liquidity management and investment services, working capital solutions, commercial card programs, trade finance and services.

TTS counts 80% of Global Fortune 500, over 1,100 public sector entities and thousands of financial institutions amongst its diverse client base Doing business In 160 countries and jurisdictions, and transacting in over 140 currencies, TTS processes some USD 4.0 trillion of client payments everyday Collaborates with clients to deliver next-generation financial solutions using TTS Innovation Labs

Application / Team Overview:

Within Treasury and Trade Solutions group, Cash Management practice of APAC region offers various Payments and Receivables products to large corporations and governments for their various needs such as salary payments, supplier payments, mutual funds dividends, insurance premium payments etc. P&R group's strategic objective is to provide best in class and innovative products to its clients to serve them for their growth and multinational aspirations.

Role Description:

We are seeking Application Development Lead for Payments and Receivables development team. The successful candidate will interact with the key stakeholders from Product, Operations, Regulators, In-Country and partner teams for handling of application activities & new projects. The candidate will also interact with Development Project Manager, Development, Testing, and Production support teams, as well as other departments within Citigroup (such as the , System Administrators, Network Engineers, Database Administrators, Data Centre Operations, and Change Control groups) for TTS platforms.

The candidate should be well versed with various integration of applications on payments domain with strong expertise on technical, deployment & functional behavior.

He/she requires exceptional communication skills across both technology and the business and will have a high degree of visibility. The candidate will be a rigorous technical manager with a strong understanding of how to build scalable, enterprise level global applications

The ideal candidate will be dependable and resourceful software professional who can comfortably work in a large development team in a globally distributed, dynamic work environment that fosters diversity, teamwork and collaboration. The ability to work in high-pressured environment is essential.

Qualifications:

Bachelors or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent Minimum 14+ years of application design and development experience.

Minimum 5 years of experience in leading globally distributed development teams successfully Strong expertise in Enterprise Application Integration development.

Experience in application management. Demonstrated people and technical management skills

Technical / Functional Proficiency:

  • Responsible for implementing Payments Services across countries with robust solution for both hardware & software solutions.

  • Experience in working on Java SpringBoot, Maven, MongoDB. Strong experience in working with various Integration technologies, preferably IBM MQ, Springboot, Kafka or any alternative Integration technology.
